summary: This script contains a single line echo command that outputs "no hello shit but screw you". It seems to be used for displaying a message with a negative connotation.

details.comment: This script contains a single line echo command that outputs "no hello shit but screw you". It seems to be used for displaying a message with a negative connotation.
details.content:
